name: Mexican Wave Simulator
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2017 (Theme: Waves)

HOW TO PLAY

Click the White Circle in the corner to start the Mexican Wave. You must keep the Wave going by keeping your mouse in the circle as it moves across the screen. If you don't it's Game Over.

CONTROLS

Left Mouse Button = Start Game
F = Toggle Fullscreen
R = Restart Game
Esc = Exit Game
